1.title: Where is the Love?

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

1.plot: Rachel and Lucas have been together for two years, but now Lucas' immaturity and Rachel's fear of commitment have brought them to an impasse. Can Rachel finally commit or is it time to call it quits?

2.title: Love is a Battlefield

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

2.plot: Sundarri and Magnus started their relationship hot and heavy, but now that passion has transformed into explosive fighting. Can they learn how to fight fair and let love win?

3.title: The Shape of Love

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

3.plot: Jocelyne and Taylor began their two year relationship with a chance encounter on social media. Now, Jocelyne's work stress has led to weight gain and Taylor can't get past it. Can they get back on track toward a healthy relationship or will this issue tear them apart?

4.title: Friendzone or Endzone

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

4.plot: Jana and Blake were friends for 8 years before realizing they were in love, but now things they did during their time in the friendzone are coming back to haunt them. Can they leave the past behind in order to have a future together?

5.title: Three's Company

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

5.plot: When they first got together Lauren promised Leo they'd have a threesome, but now that she loves him, she's changed her mind and he's not happy. Should their relationship open up or is it time to shut things down?

6.title: While You Were Sleeping

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

6.plot: Toni and Willie are partners in life and on the dance floor. Their relationship has already survived another woman, but now Willie is talking about someone new - in his sleep. Should these two continue to tango or exit stage left?

7.title: Horsing Around

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

7.plot: Only one thing can come between Allison and Killian: her horse. Can Allison reign in her love of rodeo or is it time to ride off in separate directions?

8.title: You Don't Own Me

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

8.plot: After 6 years together Andrea and Ian are ready to get married, except for one big issue. Andrea refuses to take Ian's last name and he won't marry her without it. Can they learn love is more than a name or is it time to walk down separate aisles?

9.title: All Pain No Gaines

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

9.plot: Mo and Brandi, have been together for 13 years, but ever since Mo became obsessed with fitness, their relationship has fallen apart. Can they work it out or should he find a new gym partner?

10.title: It's Me or Your Addiction

episode of.title: Make Up or Break Up (TV Series 2017–2018)

10.plot: Naomi and Justin are ready to take things to the next level. There's just one problem: Justin's addiction to sugar and tobacco. Can they rehab this relationship before he gets his next fix?

imdb.title: Make Up or Break Up
akas: Make Up or Break Up (United States)
plot: A LIVE show where a couple in crisis asks the Facebook community whether or not they should stay together.::Corin Nelson
